title: The Wallet Dilemma
description:
You find a wallet. What could go wrong?

A nearly-wordless visual novel featuring stick figures, questionable ethics, and the illusion of choice.

title: In The Name of the Ball
description:
The Bruzundanguense championship final is today. The whole country is watching.

A text-based football RPG where every decision is filtered through monarchy, pressure, and rigged dice.
Win or lose. They'll still blame you.

title: Daily Chaos Budget Manager
description:
Dodge debt. Catch crumbs. Repeat.

A frantic endless runner where your salary drops slower than your optimism.

Make it through a year. Or don't. Most don't.

title: The Talented Tom
description:
Slip into Tom's shoes. They're a bit tight, but murder tends to stretch the leather.

A text thriller based on Patricia Highsmith's classic, where every wrong move rewrites your fate. Quickly, and badly.
Type carefully.

title: The Awesome Adventures of Petulance
description:
You are Pet√∫nia. Your humans left for work. But you're sure they've been taken.

Now you, warrior cat, must defeat every living toy in the house to save them.

A bite-sized soulslike where every boss has a weakness, and your time is as limited as your attention span.
